comments:
Nightly build 20030922

- Run a test using the JUnit Plugin launcher.
- When finished, the following exception is printed to the log.

The problem here was a missing check for a null progress indicator. I have 
fixed and released the class but I couldn't replicate the problem. Martin 
which test were you running to make this happen?

Doesn't matter which test, just use the JUnit Plugin launcher in the Nightly 
build 20030922 eclipse (Probably also happens when launching a Java application)

I'm not getting the exception - are there any other symptoms?

Also if you would try it with the workbench from HEAD that would be a good way 
to verify.
